All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Database
    Database class to read and write serialized data into .dat files.
    DatabaseView
    DatabaseView provides the view to manage Database.
    DeluxeRoom
    The Class which handles the data of Deluxe Room.
    DoubleRoom
    The Class which handles the date of Double Room.
    FileType
    An Enum that corresponds to the different file types that the database will read from and write to.
    Gender
    An Enum that corresponds to the different genders of the guest.
    Guest
    The Class that handles the data of hotel's guests.
    GuestManager
    GuestManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - HotelAppView and GuestView and the model class - Guest.
    GuestView
    GuestView provides the view to take user input which calls GuestManager to manage Guest.
    HandleCheckInOutView
    HandleCheckInCheckOutView provides the view to take user input which check in or check out Room.
    Helper
    Helper class to provide support functions for other classes
    HotelApp
    The starting point of the application.
    HotelAppView
    Viewing interface for the hotel administrator
    Identity
    The Class that handles the identity details of the guests.
    IdentityType
    An Enum that corresponds to the different type of identities of the guest.
    Invoice
    The Class that handles the data of hotel's invoices.
    InvoiceManager
    InvoiceManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - InvoiceView and HandleCheckInOutView and the model class - Invoice.
    InvoiceView
    InvoiceView provides the view to take user input which calls InvoiceManager to search or print Invoice.
    MainView
    Abstract class for view classes
    ManagePaymentView
    ManagePaymentView provides the view to take user input which calls PromotionManager to manage PromotionDetails.
    MenuItem
    MenuItem represents the menu item in the customisable menu.
    MenuManager
    MenuManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view class - MenuView and the model classes - MenuItem.
    MenuView
    MenuView provides the view to take user input which calls MenuManager to manage MenuItem.
    Order
    Order represents the room servce order made either by the customer/hotel personnel.
    OrderManager
    OrderManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - OrderView and the model classes - Order.
    OrderStatus
    An Enum that corresponds to the different type of order status of the order.
    OrderView
    OrderView provides the view to take user input which calls OrderManager to manage Order.
    OutOfRange
    Thrown by a Scanner to indicate that the token retrieved is not within the specified range.
    PaymentManager
    PaymentManager is a controller class that generates Invoice and handles payment.
    PromotionDetails
    The Class that handles the discount rate and tax rate of the hotel.
    PromotionManager
    PromotionManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classess - HotelAppView and ManagePaymentView and the model classes - Invoice and PromotionDetails.
    Reservation
    The Class that handles the data of hotel's reservations.
    ReservationManager
    RservationManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - HotelAppView and ReservationView and the model classes - Reservation, Guest and Room.
    ReservationStatus
    An Enum that corresponds to the different type of reservation status of the reservation.
    ReservationView
    ReservationView provides the view to take user input which calls ReservationManager to manage Reservation.
    Room
    The Class that handles the data of hotel's rooms.
    RoomManager
    RoomManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - HotelAppView and RoomView and the model class - Room.
    RoomStatus
    An Enum that corresponds to the different type of room status of the room.
    RoomType
    An Enum that corresponds to the different room types.
    RoomView
    RoomView provides the view to take user input which calls RoomManager to manage Room.
    SingleRoom
    The class which handles the data of Single Room.
    VipSuite
    The class which handles the data of Vip Suite.
